annotations.description: Another brilliant drink from London based bartender Oscar Kinberg. Kinberg is the beverage director of the Michelin Star restaurant Hide in Mayfair, a neighb...
annotations.title: Culinary Cocktail: The Good The Bad And The Ugly

textContent:
2oz (60ml) Gin
.75oz (22.5ml) Lemon Juice
.5oz (15ml) Orgeat
1 Whole Kiwi
6 Small Mint Leaves or 4 Regular size
Egg White
Top Soda Water
Mint Sprig Garnish
Lemon Twist

Dry shake the with ice. 
Pour over ice into tall glass. 
Top with soda water. 
Garnish with mint and lemon twist

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lvCqtbL88h4
title: The Good, The Bad, And The Ugly
